Articles.Content:
In this series I represent The Kerbal Space Program.. A new program has been started (think space x) were we have a yearly budget. With that budget I purchase space craft that I need for the program. You as the Fans, and watchers of the series design these vessels and try to keep it within the budgets I specify.. If you win the Contract.. Your vessel will be used in the series.. The yearly budget will be deducted and the series will go on.. The whole space program will be run by Your vessels. The Series is basically a Custom Campaign game with objectives and cost.. There is no launching the most expensive vessel know to kerbals.. Things cost money.. And the Budget is limited.

If you would like to submit Vessels to this Series check out the vessel submit Thread I have.

I use Mission Controller Now to fund the missions and make money for the program.. And with the .21 version on the horizon I plan on taking the series as soon as possible to that version.. As soon as mods alow.

Latest Episode posted.
